name: It's Raining Inside
description:
Gameplay Video

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lr0Ywt91SQc&feature=youtu.be

Story

You live in one of the two basements of an old house. There's a bloody storm raging outside and since the house is a crap it's also raining inside. You quickly realize that basement will flood first ( gravity, if you know what i mean) and as direct consequence you'll lose your precious belongings, bascically a console and videogames.

Fully decided to stop this terrible fate and deviate the water's flow to the basement, you step outside the basement for first time in months just to find the other basement's tenant with exactly same intentions.

It's time to fight for supremacy, defend you basement and destroy your enemy's one.

Description

Shoot the ceiling and break it in order to create new leakings. Change the flow of the water so the enemy's basement floods before he floods yours. You can also repair existing leakings by using glue or deliever a melee attack to the enemie.
